content: 3 double pointed needles  needle 1 24 stitches you will be working back and forth on needle 1 to create heel flap  needles 2 and 3 12 stitches each these will just hang out until we need them later row 1 rs *slip 1 purlwise k1 repeat from * across turn work 24 stitches row 2 ws slip 1 purlwise p23 turn work repeat row 1 and 2 a total of 12 times for a total of 24 row turn the heel row 1 rs slip 1 purlwise k12 ssk k1 turn work yes you are in the middle of the row it s ok row 2 ws slip 1 purlwise p5 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs slip 1 purlwise k6 ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws slip 1 purlwise p7 p2tog p1 turn work row 5 rs slip 1 purlwise knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn work row 6 ws slip 1 purlwise purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 5 and 6 until all stitches are worked on the last four row you work you will end with one row with ssk and one row with p2tog you will have 12 stitches on needle 1 dk treasures simple ribbed sock directions continued gussets  kni t across 12 stitches on needle 1 pick up and knit 12 stitches along side of the heel flap one stitch for e ach slipped stitch you now have 24 stitches on needle 1  combine held stitches from needles 2 and 3 onto needle 2 you now have 24 stitches on needle 2 and 0 stitches on needle 3  make 1 stitch then knit across stitches on needle 2 you now have 25 stitches on needle 2 needle 2 will have stitches for the top of the foot on it needle 1 and 3 will each end up with half the bottom of the foot stitches  using needle 3 pick up and knit 12 stitches along other side of the heel flap one stitch for each slipped stitch continuing with needle 3 knit 6 stitches from needle 1 you should now have stitches arranged as follows  needle 1 18 stitches half of the bottom of the foot stitches  needle 2 25 stitches top of the foot stitches  needle 3 18 stitches half of the bottom of the foot stitches creating gussets set up round  needle 1 knit all stitches  needle 2 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end of needle  needle 3 knit all stitches round 1 knit all stitches round 2  needle 1 knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1  needle 2 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end of needle  needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end of needle repeat rounds 1 and 2 until needle 1 and 3 each have 12 stitches and needle 2 has 25 stitches 49 total foot round 1
